Title: Che gioia vivere
Writer: Leonardo Benvenuti (screenplay), Pierre Bost (dialogue), René Clément (screenplay), Piero De Bernardi (screenplay), Gualtiero Jacopetti (story)
Actors: Alain Delon, Barbara Lass, Gino Cervi, Rina Morelli
Plot: Ulisse is a naive young man out looking for a job after being released from the army. He drops the offer he gets from a group of fascists to go in with the Fossatis, a family of anarchists (unknown to him).
